review_data.title: Gourmet-Hörnchen
review_data.content: Sehr gutes Eis auf köstlichen, verzierten Hörnchen. Sehr empfehlenswert. Direkt an der Bahnhofstrasse. Auch der Cappuccino ist sehr gut.

review_data.title: The best Ice Cream in Zurich!
review_data.content: The best ice cream in Zurich!! We have been trying different ice cream in Zurich and Vanini is the BEST. It is a real amazing gelato italiano.

review_data.title: Fabulous gelato
review_data.content: Eating gelato at Vanini is like taking a trip to Italy, fantastic pistacchio from Bronte in Italy and nocciola from Piedmont, the best possible sources. Their chocolates and amaretti are definitely expensive, an amaretto with kirsche comes at a whooping 5 francs but every now...More

review_data.title: Best ice cream in Zurich
review_data.content: I’ve been trying different ice creams in Zurich and this is by far the best one. So far tried dark chocolate and pistachio, both perfect flavor and creamy

review_data.title: Superb chocolate
review_data.content: This place offered some superb chocolate and great espresso as well. Service is very friendly and caring. Definitely recommend paying a visit.

review_data.title: Ja
review_data.content: Sehr überzeugen. Ziemlich wenige Eissorten, aber die, die sie haben, sind richtig gut. In Geschmack und Konsistenz.

review_data.title: Best ice cream ever
review_data.content: Homemade Ice cream, the best !!!!! So creamy and full of flavour. Good portion size. We went back for another flavour straight after we finished the first one. Yummy Yummy !!!! Also very friendly staff. Everything was spotless clean and if you like chocolate its...More
